transcript:
Prince Vasfli and the eldest prin- cess, who were sitting under the portrait of Catherine the Great and talking eagerly. As soon as they saw Pierre and his companion they became silent, and Pierre thought he saw the princess hide something as she whispered: 
"I can't bear the sight of that woman." 
"Catiche has had tea served in the small draw- ing room," said Prince Vasili to Anna Mikhay- lovna. "Go and take something, my poor Anna Mikhdylovna, or you will not hold out."
